Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: James Ryman, A hymn to the Virgin Mary — three stanzas rhyme royal with refrain: ‘Mater misericordie’, and burden: ‘Maria mater gracie / Mater misericordie’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O prynces of eternall peasO lady of all angellis
                    bright…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…But withowte ende theryn to beMater
                    misericordie
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 312-13.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 155; 1977, 137.
